content: Good afternoon, hi admin, regarding the latest update, please for the printer settings for landscape and portrait to be displayed on the right as before and permanently for the choice of portrait and landscape settings. because we are constrained by the print settings for PDF, we have to go to the printer settings all the time. please help for the next update. thank you for your concern.

title: Bookmark Bar not importing from old computer
content:
Switching to a new Mac computer and trying to get the bookmarks back, especially the tool bar. I did the export and import steps. Both export to HTML and as a backup file. Next I airdrop it to the new computer and try and import it there. Seems to work (no errors), but no bookmarks. I have looked at google videos and tried searching you help area.

Chrome i just log in and it comes over, I remember losing everything in firefox last time I got a new computer and had to rebuild from scratch. I can't afford that again, please help.
creator: pugmac

title: OPENING MY ON LINE BANKING TO BE ABLE TO WITHDRAW SOME FUNDS.
content: I RECEIVED AN E-MAIL FROM BANK OF AMERICA WITH INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO VISIT THE ONLINE BANKING WEBSITE AND THEY REFERED ME TO http://www.boabank usa.4dq/acc/online html WITH MY ACCOUNT NUMBER AND PASSWORD. REFERING ME TO MOZILLA FIREFOX VPN AND HAVE BEEN TRYING TO GET SIGNED IN WITH THEM FOR 5-6 DAYS. CAN YOU TELL ME WHAT I'M DOING WRONG. THEY KEEP ASKING ME FOR PASSCODES ON JUST ABOUT EVERY THING I DO? THANK YOU AND PLEASE LET ME HEAR FROM YOU.
creator: tdan347056
